Title: ReAgitator: Revenge of the Parody
Writer: Abe Goren (story elements), Dylan Greenberg, Jurgen Azazel Munster (cowriter), Sam Saper (Schoolly D additional dialogue)
Actors: Amanda Flowers, Jurgen Azazel Munster, Aurelio Voltaire, Alan Merrill
Plot: Goth superstar Aurelio Voltaire is VERUM and original gangsta rapper Schoolly D is THE PRESIDENT in this cult camp catastrophe. In this send up of the horror genre, a beautiful aristocrat (...
